title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Civil Service Regulation Act 1956
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Civil Service Regulation Act 1956 

(Retirement of Prison Officers) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited civil service regulation act 1956 (retirement prison officers) regulation 2024

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 19 August 2024.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 19 August 2024.

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 3. An officer to whom the Act of 1919 applies shall retire on attaining the
text_raw:
3. An officer to whom the Act of 1919 applies shall retire on attaining the 

age of sixty-two years. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 August, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 August, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [405] 3

title: Development Plan Delivery and Reform, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations specify a maximum retirement age of sixty-two years for 
prison officers with effect from 19 August 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [405]
